body_html:
Ok, my gan is working. It is important to note that I only succeed by using 3 passes:
1 - Training the discr on true examples,
2 - Then training the generator,
3 - Then training the discr by feeding the generated examples

Trying to fuse 1 & 3 and run them in a single pass after the generator lead to a network not learning, I don't know why. Any idea?

Also, one other important thing is to apply adam selectively on the right gradients.

body:
Ok, my gan is working. It is important to note that I only succeed by using 3 passes:
1 - Training the discr on true examples,
2 - Then training the generator,
3 - Then training the discr by feeding the generated examples

Trying to fuse 1 & 3 and run them in a single pass after the generator lead to a network not learning, I don't know why. Any idea?

Also, one other important thing is to apply adam selectively on the right gradients.
